description: Detects registry changes to Office trust records where the path is located in a potentially suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Macro Enabled In A Potentially Suspicious Document
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:Setvalue AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Dd]\ [Dd][Oo][Cc][Uu][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Ss].*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\/[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\/[Ii][Nn][Ee][Tt][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\/.*/ OR /.*\/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\/[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\/[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\/.*/ OR /.*\/[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\/.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\/[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\/[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\/.*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\:\/\/\/[Dd]\:\/.*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\:\/\/\/[Ee]\:\/.*/))
